original_text: He said to the senior servant in his household, the one in charge of all that he had, “Put your hand under my thigh.
korean_text: 아브라함이 자기 집 모든 소유를 맡은 늙은 종에게 이르되 청하건대 내 허벅지 밑에 네 손을 넣으라

sentences.original_text: He said to the senior servant
the one in charge of all that he had,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가진 모든 것을 관리하던 사람에게

sentences.original_text: Put your hand under my thigh.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 내 허벅지 아래에 두어라.
